item.title: My Website
item.description: I had been thinking to have my own website for a while now. Once I decided to stop the procrastination, it just took a couple of hours to get it up and running. I used Hugo, a static site generator written in Go, to set up the site. I was looking for a simple design and the cactus theme looked pretty good to me. I’ve also setup a simple github action to publish the website to github pages!
